revised_title: Antiquities and Ancient Instruments Discovered Near Bramham-Moor in Yorkshire
tldr: The author discusses the discovery of ancient instruments and artifacts near Bramham-Moor in Yorkshire, including brass objects that may have been spearheads or walking staffs of the civilized Britains. The author also examines the origins and history of the Britains, considering their possible connections to the Trojans or the Gauls.
